publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2429 Maureen Macmillan: Future of Air Links to Brussels-That the Parliament notes with concern the news that Sabena has filed for bankruptcy and the uncertainties over direct flights from Scotland to Brussels; recognises the importance of these links to Scotland's economic, cultural and political life, and urges the Scottish Executive to work with Her Majesty's Government to safeguard Scotland's links to the heart of Europe.
S1M-2429 Future of Air Links to Brussels (lodged on 8 November 2001) Irene Oldfather*
S1M-2429 Future of Air Links to Brussels (lodged on 8 November 2001) Trish Godman*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2429 Future of Air Links to Brussels (lodged on 8 November 2001) Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Pauline McNeill*, Shona Robison*
S1M-2429 Future of Air Links to Brussels (lodged on 8 November 2001) Mr Jamie Stone*, Rhoda Grant*, Nora Radcliffe*, Hugh Henry*
S1M-2429 Future of Air Links to Brussels (lodged on 8 November 2001) Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-2429 Future of Air Links to Brussels (lodged on 8 November 2001) Christine Grahame*, Murdo Fraser*
S1M-2429 Future of Air Links to Brussels (lodged on 8 November 2001) Mr Murray Tosh*, Mr John Home Robertson*
S1M-2429 Future of Air Links to Brussels (lodged on 8 November 2001) Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-2429 Future of Air Links to Brussels (lodged on 8 November 2001) Ms Sandra White*
S1M-2429 Future of Air Links to Brussels (lodged on 8 November 2001) Cathy Peattie*
S1M-2429 Future of Air Links to Brussels (lodged on 8 November 2001) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
